query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  SUM(cash) as total_cash,
  SUM(network) as total_network,
  SUM(balance) as total_balance,
  SUM(cash + network) as total_revenue,
  SUM(employee_revenues) as total_employee_revenues
FROM daily_revenues
